RangeCoder

A convenience class to encode and decode W3C Ranges <-> opaque objects.

Summary
RangeCoderA convenience class to encode and decode W3C Ranges <-> opaque objects.
Properties
toRangeTakes a reference object and returns a W3C range.
toRefGiven a valid W3C Range, extract relevant info and store.

Properties

toRange

Takes a reference object and returns a W3C range.  The reference object is JavaScript object composed of the following properties ancestorOrigTextContent, ancestorPosition, startContainerXPath, startContainerOffset, endContainerXPath, endContainerOffset, origText.

Arguments

refObj

Returns

W3C Range.

Example

var userSelection = window.getSelection();
var myRange = userSelection.getRangeAt(0);
console.log(ShiftSpace.RangeCoder.toRef(myRange));

toRef

Given a valid W3C Range, extract relevant info and store.

Arguments

rangea W3C Range.
